metadata.name: Curl Usage on Linux
metadata.comment: Detects a curl process start on linux, which indicates a file download from a remote location or a simple web request to a remote server

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/curl')))

output.summary: Detects a curl process start on linux, which indicates a file download from a remote location or a simple web request to a remote server

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Scripts created by developers and admins 2. Administrative activity Reference: https://www.trendmicro.com/en_us/research/22/i/how-malicious-actors-abuse-native-linux-tools-in-their-attacks.html
